item.title: Opinion: Remembering Catherine O'Hara
item.description: Actor Catherine O'Hara, famed for her comedic skill, died Friday at her home in Los Angeles following a brief illness. She was 71.

item.title: The U.S. will likely lose its measles elimination status. Here's what that means
